text: Father Goose is 1964 American World War II romantic comedy movie directed by Ralph Nelson and was based on the short story A Place of Dragons by Sanford Bennett. It stars Cary Grant, Leslie Caron, Trevor Howard and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It won an Academy Award in 1965 and was nominated for 2 others. ==Other websites== * * Category:1964 war movies Category:1964 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Ralph Nelson
title: Father Goose
